channel.title: Richmond Lodge Freemasons Victoria
channel.description: Join, share and have fun with friends.

item.title: Great to catch up with friends at our 2019 November meeting 😊
item.description: At our November meeting we helped one of our member's with their third-degree. During the formal part of the meeting many of the members were involved. Great to see all the effort put in to make it a great night.
item.dc:creator: Richmond Lodge
item.content:encoded:
Pictured some of the members at our 2019 November meeting.

Sharing is caring, be awesome, visit Richmond Lodge on Facebook and share with a friend.

item.title: Richmond Lodge Freemasonry Victoria invite yourself and partner to join us to celebrate with family and friends the festive season for 2019 🎉
item.description: Join Richmond Lodge Freemasonry Victoria and celebrate with family and friends the festive season for 2019.
item.dc:creator: Richmond Lodge
item.content:encoded:
To be held at the Inner Eastern Masonic Centre, 1013 Whitehorse Rd., Box Hill on Tuesday, December 10th, 2019 at 7:00pm. The meal is open to members and friends of Richmond Lodge. There will be a $25 charge for the meal.

The always awesome Felicity Anne Walter will be entertaining.

These events are always very popular so RSVP early to secure your seats. To assist with catering RSVP to richmond.lodge.freemasons.vic@gmail.com no later than December 3rd, 2019.

Please forward this invite onto anyone that you know will be interested.

If you have any questions or would like more information about Richmond Lodge contact Matt on 0449 191 584

Sharing is caring, be awesome, visit this post on our Facebook page and share this event with a friend.

item.title: Making new friends at the Indonesian Food & Trade Festival 2019 😊
item.description: Making new friends and having some awesome conversations about what Freemasonry means at the Indonesian Food & Trade Festival 2019 in Box Hill.
item.dc:creator: Richmond Lodge
item.content:encoded: We enjoyed some great food and share with friends how together Freemasonry makes a difference.

item.title: Congrats Richmond Lodge on an awesome Oktoberfest 2019 🍺
item.description: Check out photos and congrats Richmond Lodge on an awesome Oktoberfest 2019 and thanks for everyone making it a great night.
item.dc:creator: Richmond Lodge
item.content:encoded: See any one you know? Did you enjoy Oktoberfest 2019 at Richmond Lodge? give a like and share Richmond Lodge on Facebook.
